Title: Facilities
Content:
The Barn

The Barn is one of two main practice areas at The Flying Circus and houses 2 pits, over 225 poles and several apparatus for off the pit drills. The barn is also wired with a high tech camera system to give instant replays of jumps as well as a speaker system for music to be enjoyed both indoors and out.

Outdoor Facility

The outdoor facility also has three pits, for a total of five. Two are opposite each other and share a runway. Having five pits allows us split up our vaulters into different groups for a better learning experience that is targeted toward their ability. Having both indoor and outdoor facilities also allows us to practice and compete year round, rain or shine.

Title: Forms
Content:
ALL ATHLETES taking part in any and all activities of the Hudson Valley Flying Circus must have updated membership in USATF.

Register at usatf.org for the coming year.

The Standard Meet and Practice Form

Note that this form is for practices and meets ONLY. It also only needs to be filled out once per school year. It is not for the Summer/Spring Camps, or for the Winter Club Membership. That form is listed below. HVFC Practice & Meet Form (PDF) →

2025 SUMMER FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT CAMPS

You are invited to join the fun and learning to fly with us this summer at our 28th Boys and Girls Flying Circus Pole Vault Camps in Warwick, New York. These. 2-day camps at our five pole vault pits, along with our indoor apparatus will provide a sensational understanding of the Mechanics of the Pole Vault event. Both camps are Co-Ed for Grades. 6-12. We will supply all the poles at camp and have experienced coaches leading the ability-based groups of instruction. click here

New Membership Forms 2024 - 2025

New Membership  Forms  Link for our new Flying Circus  Pole Vault Club Membership ..which begins September 1, 2024  ~. September 1, 2025. THANK YOU for all your great support again this year.    Coach St. and Staff Membership  Link  ………… https://form.jotform.com/Schuler_James/hudson-valley-flying-circus

Title: Staff
Content:
Tim St. Lawrence

The following is an article from the Rockland County Track & Field Hall of Fame:

 

When looking at the history of track and field in Rockland County, one cannot avoid frequent encounters with the surname St. Lawrence. Joe St. Lawrence was the 25-year coach of Suffern High’s track team from the 1940s through the mid-’60s, before entering the state Legislature and later serving as the County treasurer. His sons all embraced his enthusiastic love of track and field and excelled each in their own way in the sport.

 

Timothy, the second son of Marguerite and Joe St. Lawrence, showed the promise of athletic greatness even as a small child. He excelled at basketball, football, swimming, diving and being able to amaze his friends with his ability to do acrobatic tricks. The St. Lawrences’ “back yard” was expansive, and frequently with help from his dad, he and his friends would hold small track meets. Tim was usually a leading point-getter in those meets. Nothing much changed as he grew as an athlete. He was usually one of the best athletes in any contest he competed in.

Continue Reading...

 

Hugh Cauthers

Hugh Cauthers. was born to coach. As a Monroe-Woodbury Central High School(NY) teacher. and coach. for 45 years, he developed championship teams in Boys Soccer. and Boys & Girls. Indoor and Outdoor Track & Field. He promoted the field events for Head Legendary Coaches... Dick Wilson...Lou Hall. and Jim Glover in the " Crusaderland of Purple Pride." His athletes. dominated all four jumping events(Long Jump,High Jump,Pole Vault,Triple Jump). in those. 45 years..... but his real love was... The Pole Vault. He sued NY State into providing the Pole Vault Event for Girls in 1998 and proceeded in coaching Michelle Kercado to the National Record (12' 9.75) in 1999. He also coached Alana Carroll to National Gold. and Stephanie Duffy to National Silver in the Vault.

He was inducted into the Section 9 Track & Field Hall of Fame. and Co-Founded. the Flying Circus. in 2000, for all area athletes wishing. to fly higher on fiberglass. Hugh is considered by all to be... "The Father of the Girls Pole Vault" in New York State.

 

Stephanie Duffy

Stephanie Duffy put the Flying Circus on the Vault Map…with her 3 New York State Pole Vaulting Championships( 13' 1.5") …her 3 Time All-American High School honors…her Runner-Up at Nike Outdoor Nationals (12' 10.75")…Her Many Diving Accomplishments at Washingtonville High School…her National Honor Society accomplishments and her Perfect Attendance all four years in High School and her leadership skills both in High School and College.

 

 

Stephanie competed at a Championship Level for the University of South Florida, Tampa,Florida for coaching legend…Don Marsh. She was BIG EAST POLE VAUL Champion…a 5 Time ACADEMIC ALL-AMERICAN with a personal best pole vault of 13' 6.25" for the South Florida BULLS Track & Field Team. She majored in Elementary Education and graduated with Honors and Dean List status and now teaches young Elementary Students in her home district at Washington Central Schools,New York. Her positive approach in teaching and her patience with young children are above reproach. She has excellent Bio-Mechanics understanding of the complex pole vaulting movements.

Bob Sorensen

Coach Bob Sorensen comes from a long family line of pole vaulters and begins his seventh year at Flying Circus Pole Vault Academy. Coach Sorensen teaches pole vault technique and pole vault safety.

Bob uses small progressive drills aimed at the. athletes ability level and brings a strong emphasis on the approach, run, pole drop mechanics. and plant positions/angles. His positive coaching style promotes confidence and trust in his athletes skills. Coach Sorensen is a Level 1 instructor at our pole vault club sessions, camps, clinics, and meets. He also assists in all Armory camps and clinics in pole vault.

He is an EMS medical certified leader and coaches his All-American son, Dane Sorensen (Cortland University) when he is home from university. He is co-director of our home meets, including our Circus Summer Festival.

Title: MEGAN CLARK (USA) FLYS AGAIN !!!
Content: Duke University freshman and Flying Circus Alumni…Megan Clark of Durham,NC won her USATF Jr. National Pole Vault Championship last month in DesMoines,Iowa with her 13’ 7.75 leap…. And will represent USA at the Jr. Pan American Games August 25-27 in South America…CONGRATULATIONS MEGAN !!!!!!!!

Title: MEGAN CLARK (USA) FLYS AGAIN !!!
Content: Duke University freshman and Flying Circus Alumni…Megan Clark of Durham,NC won her USATF Jr. National Pole Vault Championship last month in DesMoines,Iowa with her 13’ 7.75 leap…. And will represent USA at the Jr. Pan American Games August 25-27 in South America…CONGRATULATIONS MEGAN !!!!!!!!

Title: 35 VAULTERS... CIRCUS BEACH VAULT PARTY !!!!
Content:
The Hudson Valley FLYING CIRCUS Poe Vault Academy, LLC

VAULT-TOWN, USA ….

Warwick, New York

  ” OH HAPPY DAYS ” ……….  That was the theme for the  35 energized Flyin’   Circus Pole Vaulters at  the 6th   Vertical Adventures Seaside Heights Beach Vault this past weekend.   The  end of the competitive season was a blast for all vaulters…coaches….parents  and family members  celebrating the “Spirit of Friendship”….Flying Circus Style… and  YES… it was  another RECORD for the little club nestled in the hills of Warwick Valley… THANK  YOU ALL for making our year our ‘BEST EVER’……

      ….. this meet was  more about connecting with each other and saying farewell to all our  graduating seniors… we could not be more proud of each of you….. “Your spirit ..takes us to the Moon”. 

      Enjoy the final summer days.

<hr>

  Just the Facts…..

    35 Vaulters…..NEW RECORD (old  24 vaulters in 2012) !!!

     3 Division Champions…Sydnie LeRoy(Open Women)..Chris Gulielmo(Novice A)  and Emily Savage(HS Girls)!!!!

      1 Pole Vault Raffle Winner.. Matea Freidel(Rye,NY)

      1 NEW  BEACH TENT DONATION…Liz LYNCH !!!! Thank You!!!

      1  Lodging Donation…Craig & Bobbi Jo DiBona!!!

      1 Professional Organized Event…Mike Pascuzzo & Bob Amos !!!

      1 Hands On Clinic all weekend… LAWRENCE JOHNSON…LOJO VAULT!!!

      1 COACHING LEGEND…Coach Paul Richards of the orginal FLYING CIRCUS  and Coach of Will Nesbitt’s 16’ 4” HS leap!!!!

       Great Music…Great Stories…and Great Laughter.

        The only way to end the season.

  <hr>

  “EVERYBODY”… can be SOMEBODY….

   MAKE  A DIFFERENCE.

                  -  Raul Midon

    Results….

  Boys Novice A   … 1-Chris Guglielmo(CS) 13’ 6”   Adien Woolsey(TV)  11’ 6” Marc Ocampo(NV).. 11’ 6”   Mike Skinner..(HVFC)  11’ 0”  

  Girls Novice A ….. 6-Cara Kelly(V)  9’ 6”  Niki Cleary(HVFC)  9’ 0”   Dana Rokiczak(CS)  9’ 0”

   Girls Novice B…. 4-Matea Freidel(Rye)  8’ 6” (Pole Raffel Winner!)

   Boys Novice   B…. 8-JAKE DIAMOND(S)  8’ 6”   MIKE GUGLIELMO(CS)  8’ 0” MacKenzie LeRoy(HVFC)

   Girls HS Championship…. 1-Emily Savage(Weston)  12’ 0”  2-Jenna Calandro(Newown,CT)  11’ 6”  6-Maddie Schneider(Darien,CT)  11’ 0”  Kara Snyder(C) 11’ 0”  Marisa Robbins)G) 11’ 0”  Kali Manly(BH) 10’ 6”

    Boys HS Championship…. 3-Peter Fagan(W)  15’ 6”  4-Justin Farrenkopf(E) 15’ 0”  5-Derek DiBona(Warwick) 14’ 6”  6-Karl Nelsen(SW) 14’ 0”  Whit Oehler-Marx(NP) 13’ 6”  James Deutmeyer(FP)  13’ 6”   Chris Rough(WH) 13’ 6”   Luke Annichiarica(OT)  13’ 0”  Pat Lynch(C)  12’ 6”

   Open Women…1-Sydnie LeRoy(HVFC)  12’ 0”  Maddesen Weekes(HVFC)  10’ 0”  Dana Fineman(HVFC).. 9’6”  Jessica Sector(HVFC)

   Open Men…. TJ Murphy(HVFC)  14’ 0”  Ben Simonet(HVFC)  13’ 6”  Jordan Subai(HVFC)  13’ 0”  Jason Sector(HVFC)  13’ 0”  Nick Perez(HVFC)

   Mens Masters…. 2-Will Nesbitt(HVFC)   12’ 0”

<hr>

  SPECIAL THANKS  … to Coach Will Nesbitt and Coach Ben Simonet for delivering  our new MONDO SUPER X PERFORMANCE RUNWAYS for our Fall  classes..and to Todd Uckermarl and derek DiBona for helping  with the installation!!!!!    FASTEST RUNWAY in the WORLD !!!!!

   New Fall Pole Vault Class Schedule coming  soon…

   Check our new Web Site for all details…..

     ”Reach for Heaven”……. FLYING CIRCUS.

Title: CIRCUS FALL VAULTING COMING SEPTEMBER 9!!! JOIN THE FUN!!!
Content: The ”BARN DOORS” are about to swing open for the preparation of the exciting Indoor Track & Field Season that will soon be happening at The New Balance Track & Field Center Armory in New York City!!! It’s time to get ready for all the fun and competition …. Join us as often as possible! Our fall practice and meet schedules are now available online here. A few things to note: ALL ATHLETES taking part in any and all activities of the Hudson Valley Flying Circus must have up dated membership in USATF… Register at usatf.org/membership for the coming year. POLE VAULTING POLE RENTAL PROGRAM has been discontinued at the Flying Circus…. as well as lending out overnight poles to athletes. All athletics should talk to your High School Coaches ASAP in regard to providing poles for you this Indoor and Outdoor seasons. When ordering your poles… please specify UCS Spirit Pole Vaulting Poles…the most reliable pole vaulting poles made. Contact mfathletic.com for your ordering of UCS Spirit Vaulting Poles and Equipment!!!!! It will be hard to duplicate this years success at The FLYING CIRCUS… 6 NATIONAL PV TITLES 13 STATE POLE VAULTING CHAMPIONS 9 ALL AMERICANS 123 CLUB MEMBERS But… WE ARE STARTING THE NEW CHALLENGE on SEPTEMBER 9th….. JOIN THE SURGE!!!!! POSITIVELY POLE VAULT …..”FLYING CIRCUS”

Content: The ”BARN DOORS” are about to swing open for the preparation of the exciting Indoor Track & Field Season that will soon be happening at The New Balance Track & Field Center Armory in New York City!!! It’s time to get ready for all the fun and competition …. Join us as often as possible! Our fall practice and meet schedules are now available online here. A few things to note: ALL ATHLETES taking part in any and all activities of the Hudson Valley Flying Circus must have up dated membership in USATF… Register at usatf.org/membership for the coming year. POLE VAULTING POLE RENTAL PROGRAM has been discontinued at the Flying Circus…. as well as lending out overnight poles to athletes. All athletics should talk to your High School Coaches ASAP in regard to providing poles for you this Indoor and Outdoor seasons. When ordering your poles… please specify UCS Spirit Pole Vaulting Poles…the most reliable pole vaulting poles made. Contact mfathletic.com for your ordering of UCS Spirit Vaulting Poles and Equipment!!!!! It will be hard to duplicate this years success at The FLYING CIRCUS… 6 NATIONAL PV TITLES 13 STATE POLE VAULTING CHAMPIONS 9 ALL AMERICANS 123 CLUB MEMBERS But… WE ARE STARTING THE NEW CHALLENGE on SEPTEMBER 9th….. JOIN THE SURGE!!!!! POSITIVELY POLE VAULT …..”FLYING CIRCUS”

Title: WINTER HVFC CAMP MEMBERSHIP REGISTRATION OPENS SEPTEMBER 1!!!
Content:
The form will be available under the “forms” tab that day, and will also be sent via email.

More information to come…

Title: JOIN-the-MOVEMENT - WINTER CLUB MEMBERSHIP REGISTRATION opens SEPT 1 @ Noon!!!
Content: The LAUNCHING PAD is in place…. and The POLE VAULT ROCKET is about to BLAST -OFF!!! ….. WELCOME to another exciting year at the FLYING CIRCUS POLE VAULT ACADEMY. Our programs have been expanded to meet the needs of our Beginners…Intermediates and our Elite Pole Vaulters in Middle School…High School and Open/Masters programs… We invite you to ..”JOIN-the- POLE VAULT MOVEMENT” here at FLYING CIRCUS this Fall…Winter and Spring seasons. REGISTRATION FORMS for our very LIMITED WINTER POLE VAULT CLUB will be available on September 1 beginning at 12 Noon on our NEW & IMPROVED WEB SITE (www.hvflyingcircus.com) and here at our Flying Circus e-mail NEWSLETTER … Act Quickly..as the first 20 Boys and the first 20 Girls to Register will be accepted… Avoid the WAITING LIST and jump with us this winter in Warm conditions and a Positive Environment !!!!! BOYS CLUB Meets Monday and Wednesdays Class 1..5:30-7PM Class 2…7:00-8;30PM GIRLS CLUB Meets Tuesday and Thursdays Class 1…5:30-7PM Class 2…7:00-8:30PM FALL VAULTING BEGINS Monday September 9 !!!! It’s time to get a JUMP-START on your competition…. Mondays…. Girls Elite 5:30-7Pm Boys Elite…7-8:30PM Tuesdays.. Girls Begin/Intermediate 5:30-7PM Boys Begin/Intermediate 7-8:30PM Wednesdays..Private Lessons By Appointment Thursday.. Girls Begin/Intermediate 5:30-7PM Boys Begin/Intermediate 7-8:30PM Fridays….Girls Elite 5:30-7PM Boys Elite…7-8:30PM Saturdays….Private Lessons By Appointment Sundays.. Girls Open…1-2:30Pm Boys Open 2:30-4PM Girls Level 3.. 11’ 0” PR and Up Boys Level 3 .. 13’ 0” PR and Up FLYING CIRCUS…… INVESTING-in-KIDS
